trans_title: 纽约市芭蕾舞团：葛蓓莉亚
introduction: Delibes, COPPELIA(ballet in 3 acts, choreography by George Balanchine and Alexandra Danilova after Petipa. Book by Charles Nuitter after E.T.A. Hoffman).Edward Villella, hostRobert Irving, ConductorPatricia McBride (Swanhilda/Coppelia), Helgi Tomasson (Frantz), Shaun O'Brien (Dr. Coppelius)Live intermission interviews backstage with McBride/ Tomasson, Danilova; O'Brien, Irving.Program Length: 2:28:48
chinese_title: 纽约市芭蕾舞团：葛蓓莉亚
